#: List of all the extractors available

docslab.#: Sets gallery-dvk to write JSON metadata for pages downloaded from docs-lab.com
Sets the path to the download archive for Doc's Lab
Overrides the default include values to include favorites when downloading from a Doc's Lab user
Overrides default settings to not automatically download associated works of submissions
Overrides the default filename format to include the page date and ID
Overrides the default amount of time to sleep when loading pages and downloading files

kemonocafe.#: Sets gallery-dvk to write JSON metadata for pages downloaded from kemono.cafe
Sets the path to the download archive for Kemono Café
Overrides the default filename format to only use the Kemono Café ID
Overrides the default amount of time to sleep when loading pages and downloading files

transfur.#: Sets gallery-dvk to write JSON metadata for pages downloaded from Transfur.com
Sets the path to the download archive for Transfur
Sets the Username and Password for login to Transfur.com
Overrides the default include values to include favorites when downloading from a Transfur user
Overrides the default filename format to include the page date and ID
Overrides the default amount of time to sleep when loading pages and downloading files

webtoon.#: Sets gallery-dvk to write JSON metadata for pages downloaded from Webtoon
Sets the path to the download archive for Webtoon
Overrides the default filename format to include the page date and ID
Overrides the default amount of time to sleep when loading pages and downloading files
Sets the Webtoon extractor to only include the stitched-together episode images, not the individual images
